title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.23 - Acceptable bill validator locations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.23 - Acceptable bill validator locations

State Regulations

If a gaming device is equipped with a bill validator, such bill validator shall be located in a locked area of such gaming device
(e.g., require opening of the main door to access), but not in the logic area
of such gaming device. Only the bill or voucher insertion area is permitted to
be accessible by the player. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5319.23

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
